title: Ep. 86 - What is Euphoria?
description:
Today, Todd, Digs, Zito, Bailey, Gumpy and Gorms continue to hold down the fort while Pat, Nick, Evan and Ty are still in the Bahamas. They discuss tough topics like cable vs streaming platforms, traveling on Air Canada, the life of an air traffic controller, movie roles they'd like to have, vegas buffets, Sandra Bullock, Taco Bell, hipster bars and Gorms' obsession with the WNBA.
